name: ghostfile
description: Ghostfile is a simple blog publishing tool for static content backed by plain text or markdown. It exposes a minimal UI for posting, editing, and managing entries, ideal for content-focused workflows.
features: Static Publishing: Publish blog posts and content backed by plain text or markdown files.
Markdown Editing: Write and edit content using markdown syntax with a simple editor interface.
Minimal Interface: Focus on writing with a distraction-free, lightweight blogging UI.
File-Based Storage: Store posts as individual files for easy backup and version control.
Content Management: Organize, edit, and manage blog entries through a streamlined web interface.
No Database Required: Operate without database dependencies using file-based content storage.
Quick Publishing: Rapidly publish and update content without complex workflows.
Lightweight Deployment: Minimal resource requirements for simple, content-focused blogging.
